chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: InfraRED is an open source performance tool to monitor JavaEE based application performance. By using Aspect, it collects data to measure performance and reports data analysis result. Anyframe Monitoring Tool fixes diverse infraRED( http://infrared.sourceforge.net) based bugs inherited within infraRED and provides enhanced UI. Next, basic structure of InfraRED, foundation of Anyframe Monitoring Tool and major features of Anyframe Monitoring Tool will be discussed.

section.title: Basic structure
section.para: Infrared basically consists of Agent, Collector, and GUI as shown in picture below.

listitem.para: Agent : to collect and integrate data on application implementation based on request from application to be monitored and send them to Collector
Collector : to combine data delivered from different agents and store them in DB.

GUI : to exhibit collected data in diverse forms to users by asking query to Collector. Anyframe Monitoring Tool uses Ajax based Google Web Tool Kit or GWT as basis and offers more convenient, efficient and enhanced UI.

section.title: Major features
section.para: As below are major features provided at Anyframe Monitoring Tool.

row.entry: Absolute module, Hierarchical modle and monitoring statistics on final call are shown.
Performance statistics for various elements, jsp, http, etc.
Each layer of SQL, JDBC, JSP, HTTP displays monitoring statistics.
Data analysis is supported with three-dimensional graph, color labels and Tooltip labels.
A total run time, running numbers and percentage point over a total implementation on called commands are offered in the form of easy representation.
For easy representation of query statement, all queries are changed in capitals and their words are spaced.
For easy representation of data analysis result, data, percentage point and percentage point bar graph use coloring.
The configuration allows checking of monitoring result on various applications.
It supports the report creation in the format of Excel, PDF, HTML, CSV.
It supports Refresh feature to reset collected data up to now or update the latest implementation contents.
